name: Carrom
discri: A classic tabletop game where players use a striker to flick small discs into corner pockets on a square board, aiming to score points by sinking their own colored discs while avoiding the opponent's. It's a game of skill, precision, and strategy, perfect for indoor fun with family and friends.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
